snippet: Mitt Romney's interpretation of the song would surprise Katharine Lee Bates, who wrote the words.
abstract: Mitt Romney's interpretation of the song would surprise Katharine Lee Bates, who wrote the words.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has done a swell job memorizing the words to "America the Beautiful." Especially since that awkward afternoon in 2008 when he had trouble reminding a houseful of Iowans about "our beautiful land and our mountains and and and our waving, or, uh, what is it, let's see, waving filled no, how does it and uh  amber waves of grain!"
